description:
Get the care and indulgence of an oil in a fast absorbing lotion with NIVEA Oil Infused Lotion Coconut & Monoi Oil. Indulge your senses with a delicate fragrance and care for your skin with 24h deep moisture. Your skin is left feeling irresistibly smooth and beautifully radiant all day long.

NIVEA Oil in Lotion Coconut & Monoi Oil has been developed with your normal to dry skin in mind. The formula with precious Monoi Oil has been carefully blended into a fast-absorbing lotion. Awaken your senses with a delicate coconut scent and deeply moisturise your skin without greasy residue. This oil in lotion smoothes your skin, leaving it nourished and moisturised for over 24 hours. The ingredients for this lotion have been carefully selected according to strict quality standards – the skin compatibility has been dermatologically approved. This product comes in a practical pump bottle for easy usage.

1Quality Ingredients: infused with Monoi Oil

2Pleasant Fragrance: tropical Coconut Scent

324 Hour Coverage: deep moisture coverage

4Fast Absorption: soft and creamy yet fast absorbing for a non-greasy feeling

5Usage: perfect for everyday use to boost your skin’s hydration

6Suitable for normal to dry skin types: Skin tolerance dermatologically proven
name: Nivea Oil In Lotion Coconut & Monoi Oil Body Lotion Moisturiser 400ml
